sen.j: 黄文王（きぶみおう、? ～天平宝字元年（757年）7月4日 (旧暦)）は、奈良時代の皇族。
sen.e: Prince Kibumi (year of birth unknown, died on July 28, 757) was a member of the imperial family who lived in the Nara period.
sen.cmt: 天平宝字元年（757年）7月4日：西暦757年7月28日となるようです。http://maechan.net/kanreki/
sen.e: The Prince Kibumi (year of birth unknown - July 28, 757) was a member of the Imperial Family who lived in the Nara period.

sen.e: The Prince Kibumi (year of birth unknown - July 28, 757) was a member of the Imperial Family who lived in the Nara period.

sen.j: 母は藤原不比等の娘藤原長娥子。
sen.e: His mother was FUJIWARA no Nagako, who was a daughter of FUJIWARA no Fuhito.

sen.j: 729年（天平元年）のときの長屋王の変では、藤原不比等の外孫であったために死を免れる。
sen.e: He survived the Nagayao no Hen (Conspiracy of Nagayao) occurred in 729 because he was a sotomago (grandchild from a daughter married into another family) of FUJIWARA no Fuhito.

sen.j: 739年正月13日、従四位下、740年11月21日、従四位上。
sen.e: On January 13, 739, he was granted the rank of Jushiinoge (Junior Fourth Rank, Lower Grade), and on November 21, 740, the rank of Jushiinojo (Junior Fourth Rank, Upper Grade), respectively.

sen.j: 748年4月22日の元正天皇崩御、756年5月3日の聖武天皇崩御に際しては装束司に任命されている。
sen.e: He was appointed a shozokushi (an official who handled important rituals) on death of the Empress Gensho on April 22, 748 and the Emperor Shomu on May 3, 756.

sen.j: 757年（天平宝字元年）橘奈良麻呂の乱のとき、奈良麻呂により皇位に擁せられた。
sen.e: When the revolt of TACHIBANA no Naramaro broke out in 757, he was granted the rank of the Imperial Throne by Naramaro.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: When the revolt of TACHIBANA no Naramaro broke out in 757, he was pressed to be on the Imperial Throne by Naramaro.

sen.e: When the revolt of TACHIBANA no Naramaro broke out in 757, he was pressed to be on the Imperial Throne by Naramaro.

sen.j: だが、兄の安宿王が白状したため捕らえられ、久奈多夫礼（頑に狂った者の意）と改名させられた後、拷問を受けて死亡した。
sen.e: But when Prince Asukabe, who was his older brother, made a confession, he was captured, forced to change his name to Kunatabure (stubbornly mad), and tortured to death.
